name: Pineapple Purple Skunk
description: Bred by MTG Seeds, Pineapple Purple Skunk is a hybrid cannabis strain that combines Pineapple and Purple Skunk genetics. Together, these parent strains pass on a sweet and sour blend of fruity and berry flavors. Pineapple Purple Skunk blooms in vibrant hues of purple and green and shows resilience against mold.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Uplifted, Euphoric, Aroused, Pain, Depression, Stress, Fatigue, Headaches, Headache, Dry Mouth, Anxious
